title: Please assist in identifying this font
content:
Hi,

trying to identify the font designed for us some 8 years ago. Is this a font or a designed image or an altered font? See attached file.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828173325im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Primary-Water2_4745.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [PW logotype.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828173325/http:/typophile.com/files/PW%20logotype.png) | 6.52 KB |
author: McNott

comments.content:
Hey,

This looks like a custom cut of Bauhaus. see the following link - [http://www.ffonts.net/Bauhaus.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828173325/http:/www.ffonts.net/Bauhaus.font "http://www.ffonts.net/Bauhaus.font"). You should be able to find something similar for free online.

Best,  
Arjun

> see the following link - [http://www.ffonts.net/Bauhaus.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828173325/http:/www.ffonts.net/Bauhaus.font "http://www.ffonts.net/Bauhaus.font"). You should be able to find something similar for free online.

... Part of [Bauhaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828173325/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/bauhaus) is everything except a free font.
